alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 3:57PM CDT until April 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... Central Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 356 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hensley Island to near Pine Bluff to near Toledo, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Stuttgart... Star City... Altheimer... Gould... Gillett... Holly Grove... Humphrey... Grady... Almyra... St. Charles... Whitefield... Little Bayou Meto Park... Woodville... Douglas... Herbine... Nebo... Feenyville... Cottondale... Linwood... TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and southeastern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern and southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln; Monroe
